awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Joanna is in a touring girl's choir and Mark is a struggling architect. when they first meet on the road in Europe. The film follows their life together --- through courtship and marriage, infidelity and parenthood --- all on the road in a variety of cars through a score of time-shifting vignettes.
plot: A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of infidelity in their troubled ten-year marriage.
title: Two for the Road
